thread.title: 7 Things You Do That Look Completely Ridiculous, So Just Quit It
thread.title_full: 7 Things You Do That Look Completely Ridiculous, So Just Quit It

author: Andy McDonald
title: 7 Things You Do That Look Completely Ridiculous, So Just Quit It
text:
7 Things You Do That Look Completely Ridiculous, So Just Quit It Standby to be judged. Andy McDonald Comedy Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/19/2015 04:37 PM EDT 
Hey, you're a human being, and that means you're going to look stupid once in a while. It happens. 
There are things out there that some of us do that look completely and utterly ridiculous, and should really be stopped. Listen, we're not here to judge. 
Standby for the following judgements. Putting coffee sleeves on cold drinks. Ugh, the aliens will conquer us so quickly and easily. Getty Putting your kid on a leash. Or rather unleashing a grown-up weirdo. Patrik Giardino via Getty Images Toed shoes. Someone's parents used child leashes.
